command.googleLogin: Antigravity Quota Watcher: Login with Google
command.googleLogout: Antigravity Quota Watcher: Logout from Google
config.apiMethod.getUserStatus: GET_USER_STATUS - Full quota info via local API
DISABLED_config.apiMethod.commandModelCo: COMMAND_MODEL_CONFIG - Lite mode via local API
config.apiMethod.googleApi: GOOGLE_API - Fetch quota via Google Cloud Code API (requires login)
config.showPlanName: Show account tier in status bar (e.g., Free, Pro)
config.showGeminiPro: Show Gemini Pro (G Pro) quota in status bar
config.showGeminiFlash: Show Gemini Flash (G Flash) quota in status bar
config.showPromptCredits: Show Prompt Credits (not officially enabled yet)
config.forcePowerShell: Use PowerShell mode for process detection [Windows only, requires extension restart]
config.proxyAutoDetect: Auto-detect system proxy (HTTPS_PROXY, HTTP_PROXY environment variables)
config.proxyUrl: Proxy URL (e.g., http://127.0.0.1:7890). Leave empty to use auto-detected proxy
